content: this quick and easy classic scarf crochet pattern blends elegance with simplicity and creates a gorgeous and cozy women s crochet scarf that you will be proud to wear or give as a gift the pattern includes step-by-step written instructions and a full video tutorial additional details skill level easy size the pattern creates a scarf that is approx 7 wide and 68 high instructions for adjusting the size are included in the pattern yarn any size 4 medium yarn you will need approx 450 yds in total i used heartland yarn by lion brand in the color rocky mountains this yarn is size 4 medium and 100% acrylic a skein is 251 yds / 230 m and 5 oz / 142 g i used two skeins crochet hook h/8 5 00 mm other materials yarn needle scissors and a measuring tape terminology the pattern is written in english for right-handed crochet using standard us crochet terminology
